00046 gboolean
00047 get_widget_position (GtkWidget *widget, gint *x, gint *y)
00048 {
00049     GdkPixbuf* pixbuf = NULL;
00050 
00051     /* assertion checks */
00052     g_assert (widget);
00053     g_assert (x);
00054     g_assert (y);
00055 
00056     gdk_window_get_origin (GDK_WINDOW (widget->window), x, y);
00057     pixbuf = gtk_image_get_pixbuf (GTK_IMAGE (widget));
00058     *x += (gdk_pixbuf_get_width (pixbuf) / 2);
00059     *y += gdk_pixbuf_get_height (pixbuf);
00060     g_debug ("widget position x=%i, y=%i", *x, *y);
00061     return TRUE;
00062 }

00069 gint
00070 find_udi_parray_index (GPtrArray *parray, const gchar *udi)
00071 {
00072     GenericObject *slotData = NULL;
00073     gint a;
00074 
00075     /* assertion checks */
00076     g_assert (parray);
00077     g_assert (udi);
00078 
00079     for (a=0;a<parray->len;a++) {
00080         slotData = (GenericObject *) g_ptr_array_index (parray, a);
00081         g_return_val_if_fail (slotData, -1);
00082         if (strcmp (slotData->udi, udi) == 0)
00083             return a;
00084     }
00085     return -1;
00086 }

00093 GenericObject *
00094 genericobject_find (GPtrArray *parray, const gchar *udi)
00095 {
00096     gint a;
00097 
00098     /* assertion checks */
00099     g_assert (parray);
00100     g_assert (udi);
00101 
00102     a = find_udi_parray_index (parray, udi);
00103     if (a != -1)
00104         return (GenericObject *) g_ptr_array_index (parray, a);
00105     return NULL;
00106 }
00107 
00114 GenericObject *
00115 genericobject_add (GPtrArray *parray, const gchar *udi)
00116 {
00117     GenericObject *slotData = NULL;
00118     gint a;
00119 
00120     /* assertion checks */
00121     g_assert (parray);
00122     g_assert (udi);
00123 
00124     a = find_udi_parray_index (parray, udi);
00125     if (a != -1)
00126         return NULL;
00127 
00128     slotData = g_new (GenericObject, 1);
00129     strcpy (slotData->udi, udi);
00130     slotData->powerDevice = POWER_UNKNOWN;
00131     g_ptr_array_add (parray, (gpointer) slotData);
00132     return slotData;
00133 }
00134 
00140 gboolean
00141 run_gconf_script (const char *path)
00142 {
00143     GConfClient *client = NULL;
00144     gchar *command = NULL;
00145     gboolean ret = FALSE;
00146 
00147     /* assertion checks */
00148     g_assert (path);
00149 
00150     client = gconf_client_get_default ();
00151     command = gconf_client_get_string (client, path, NULL);
00152     if (command) {
00153         g_debug ("Executing '%s'", command);
00154         ret = g_spawn_command_line_async (command, NULL);
00155         if (!ret)
00156             g_warning ("Couldn't execute '%s'.", command);
00157         g_free (command);
00158     } else
00159         g_warning ("'%s' is missing!", path);
00160     return ret;
00161 }

00168 gchar *
00169 convert_dbus_enum_to_string (gint value)
00170 {
00171     if (value == GPM_DBUS_SCREENSAVE)
00172         return _("screensave");
00173     else if (value == GPM_DBUS_SHUTDOWN)
00174         return _("shutdown");
00175     else if (value == GPM_DBUS_SUSPEND)
00176         return _("software suspend");
00177     else if (value == GPM_DBUS_HIBERNATE)
00178         return _("hibernation");
00179     else if (value == GPM_DBUS_LOGOFF)
00180         return _("session log off");
00181     g_warning ("value '%i' not converted", value);
00182     return NULL;
00183 }
00184 
00191 GString *
00192 convert_gpmdbus_to_string (gint value)
00193 {
00194     GString *retval = g_string_new ("{");
00195     if (value & GPM_DBUS_SCREENSAVE)
00196         g_string_append (retval, "GPM_DBUS_SCREENSAVE|");
00197     if (value & GPM_DBUS_SHUTDOWN)
00198         g_string_append (retval, "GPM_DBUS_SHUTDOWN|");
00199     if (value & GPM_DBUS_SUSPEND)
00200         g_string_append (retval, "GPM_DBUS_SUSPEND|");
00201     if (value & GPM_DBUS_HIBERNATE)
00202         g_string_append (retval, "GPM_DBUS_HIBERNATE|");
00203     if (value & GPM_DBUS_LOGOFF)
00204         g_string_append (retval, "GPM_DBUS_LOGOFF|");
00205 
00206     /* replace the final | with } */
00207     retval->str[retval->len-1] = '}';
00208     return retval;
00209 }

00216 GString *
00217 get_time_string (GenericObject *slotData)
00218 {
00219     GString* timestring = NULL;
00220 
00221     /* assertion checks */
00222     g_assert (slotData);
00223 
00224     timestring = get_timestring_from_minutes (slotData->minutesRemaining);
00225     if (!timestring)
00226         return NULL;
00227     if (slotData->isCharging)
00228         timestring = g_string_append (timestring, _(" until charged"));
00229     else
00230         timestring = g_string_append (timestring, _(" remaining"));
00231 
00232     return timestring;
00233 }
00234 
00244 void
00245 create_virtual_of_type (GPtrArray *objectData, GenericObject *slotDataReturn, gint powerDevice)
00246 {
00247     GenericObject *slotData = NULL;
00248     gint a;
00249     gint objectCount = 0;
00250     gint percentageCharge;
00251     gint minutesRemaining;
00252 
00253     GenericObject *slotDataTemp[5]; /* not going to get more than 5 objects */
00254 
00255     /* assertion checks */
00256     g_assert (slotDataReturn);
00257 
00258     for (a=0; a < objectData->len; a++) {
00259         slotData = (GenericObject *) g_ptr_array_index (objectData, a);
00260         if (slotData->powerDevice == powerDevice && slotData->present) {
00261             slotDataTemp[objectCount] = slotData;
00262             objectCount++;
00263         }
00264     }
00265     /* no objects */
00266     if (objectCount == 0) {
00267         g_warning ("create_virtual_of_type couldn't find device type %i", powerDevice);
00268         slotDataReturn = NULL;
00269         return;
00270     }
00271 
00272     /* short cut */
00273     if (objectCount == 1) {
00274         slotDataReturn->percentageCharge = slotDataTemp[0]->percentageCharge;
00275         slotDataReturn->minutesRemaining = slotDataTemp[0]->minutesRemaining;
00276         return;
00277     }
00278 
00279     /* work out average */
00280     percentageCharge = 0;
00281     minutesRemaining = 0;
00282     for (a=0;a<objectCount;a++) {
00283         percentageCharge += slotDataTemp[a]->percentageCharge;
00284         minutesRemaining += slotDataTemp[a]->minutesRemaining;
00285     }
00286     slotDataReturn->percentageCharge = percentageCharge / objectCount;
00287     slotDataReturn->minutesRemaining = minutesRemaining / objectCount;
00288 }

00292 {
00293     /*
00294      * This is a dummy function that is called only when not set verbose
00295      * (and we shouldn't spew all the debug stuff)
00296      */
00297 }

00304 int
00305 convert_string_to_policy (const gchar *gconfstring)
00306 {
00307     /* assertion checks */
00308     g_assert (gconfstring);
00309 
00310     if (strcmp (gconfstring, "nothing") == 0)
00311         return ACTION_NOTHING;
00312     if (strcmp (gconfstring, "suspend") == 0)
00313         return ACTION_SUSPEND;
00314     if (strcmp (gconfstring, "shutdown") == 0)
00315         return ACTION_SHUTDOWN;
00316     if (strcmp (gconfstring, "hibernate") == 0)
00317         return ACTION_HIBERNATE;
00318     if (strcmp (gconfstring, "warning") == 0)
00319         return ACTION_WARNING;
00320 
00321     g_warning ("gconfstring '%s' not converted", gconfstring);
00322     return ACTION_UNKNOWN;
00323 }
00324 
00330 gchar *
00331 convert_policy_to_string (gint value)
00332 {
00333     if (value == ACTION_NOTHING)
00334         return "nothing";
00335     else if (value == ACTION_SUSPEND)
00336         return "suspend";
00337     else if (value == ACTION_SHUTDOWN)
00338         return "shutdown";
00339     else if (value == ACTION_HIBERNATE)
00340         return "hibernate";
00341     else if (value == ACTION_WARNING)
00342         return "warning";
00343     g_warning ("value '%i' not converted", value);
00344     return NULL;
00345 }
00346 
00352 gint convert_haltype_to_powerdevice (const gchar *type)
00353 {
00354     /* assertion checks */
00355     g_assert (type);
00356 
00357     if (strcmp (type, "ac_adapter") == 0)
00358         return POWER_AC_ADAPTER;
00359     else if (strcmp (type, "ups") == 0)
00360         return POWER_UPS;
00361     else if (strcmp (type, "mouse") == 0)
00362         return POWER_MOUSE;
00363     else if (strcmp (type, "keyboard") == 0)
00364         return POWER_KEYBOARD;
00365     else if (strcmp (type, "pda") == 0)
00366         return POWER_PDA;
00367     else if (strcmp (type, "primary") == 0)
00368         return POWER_PRIMARY_BATTERY;
00369     return POWER_UNKNOWN;
00370 }
00371 
00377 gchar *
00378 convert_powerdevice_to_string (gint powerDevice)
00379 {
00380     if (powerDevice == POWER_UPS)
00381         return _("UPS");
00382     else if (powerDevice == POWER_AC_ADAPTER)
00383         return _("AC Adapter");
00384     else if (powerDevice == POWER_MOUSE)
00385         return _("Logitech mouse");
00386     else if (powerDevice == POWER_KEYBOARD)
00387         return _("Logitech keyboard");
00388     else if (powerDevice == POWER_PRIMARY_BATTERY)
00389         return _("Laptop battery");
00390     else if (powerDevice == POWER_PDA)
00391         return _("PDA");
00392     return _("Unknown device");
00393 }
00394 
00400 gchar *
00401 get_chargestate_string (GenericObject *slotData)
00402 {
00403     /* assertion checks */
00404     g_assert (slotData);
00405 
00406     if (!slotData->present)
00407         return _("missing");
00408     else if (slotData->isCharging)
00409         return _("charging");
00410     else if (slotData->isDischarging)
00411         return _("discharging");
00412     else if (!slotData->isCharging &&
00413          !slotData->isDischarging &&
00414          slotData->percentageCharge > 99)
00415         return _("fully charged");
00416     else if (!slotData->isCharging &&
00417          !slotData->isDischarging)
00418         return _("charged");
00419     return _("unknown");
00420 }
00421 
00427 GString *
00428 get_timestring_from_minutes (gint minutes)
00429 {
00430     GString* timestring = NULL;
00431     gint hours;
00432 
00433     if (minutes == 0)
00434         return NULL;
00435 
00436     timestring = g_string_new ("");
00437     if (minutes == 1)
00438         g_string_printf (timestring, _("1 minute"));
00439     else if (minutes < 60)
00440         g_string_printf (timestring, _("%i minutes"), minutes);
00441     else {
00442         hours = minutes / 60;
00443         minutes = minutes - (hours * 60);
00444         if (minutes == 0) {
00445             if (hours == 1)
00446                 g_string_printf (timestring, _("1 hour"));
00447             else
00448                 g_string_printf (timestring, _("%i hours"), hours);
00449         } else {
00450             if (hours == 1) {
00451                 if (minutes == 1)
00452                     g_string_printf (timestring, _("1 hour 1 minute"));
00453                 else
00454                     g_string_printf (timestring,
00455                     _("1 hour %i minutes"), minutes);
00456             } else
00457                 g_string_printf (timestring,
00458                     _("%i hours %i minutes"), hours, minutes);
00459         }
00460     }
00461     return timestring;
00462 }
